appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appNameShort.description: The short_name (max 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app name. It is often used where there is insufficient space for the full name, such as App launcher and New Tab page.

appDesc.message: Spaces eller tabs? Bevar din gode kodestil ved at gøre blanke tegn synlige i koder på Github.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
